maqras.text: 'alam nwse -ayha alnby- lak sadrak lshraye aldyn, waldaewat 'iilaa allh, walatsaf bmkarm alakhlaq, whttna eank bdhlk himlk aldhy athql zhrk, wjelnak -bma 'aneamna ealayk min almkarm- fi mnzlt rafieat ealy?

alm nwse -ayha alnby- lak sadrak lshraye aldyn, waldaewat 'iilaa allh, walatsaf bmkarm alakhlaq, whttna eank bdhlk himlk aldhy athql zhrk, wjelnak -bma 'aneamna ealayk min almkarm- fi mnzlt rafieat ealy?

fla ythnk 'adhana aedayk ean nashr alrsalt; fa'iina mae aldyq frjana, 'iina mae aldyq frjana
fla ythnk 'adhana aedayk ean nashr alrsalt; fa'iina mae aldyq frjana, 'iina mae aldyq frjana
f'idha faraght min 'umur aldunya washghalha fajidd fi alebadt, wa'iilaa rabik wahdah farghab fima endh
f'idha faraght min 'umur aldunya washghalha fajidd fi alebadt, wa'iilaa rabik wahdah farghab fima endh

'aqsm allah baltyn walzytwn, wahuma min althimar almshhwrt, waqsm bjbl "twr syna'" aldhy kllam allah ealayh musaa tklymana, waqsm bhdha albalad al'amin min kuli khawf wahu "mk" mhbt al'islam. laqad khalaqna al'iinsan fi 'ahsan swrt, thuma radadnah 'iilaa alnaar 'iin lam yutie allh, wayatabie alrsl, lkn aladhin amanuu waeamiluu al'aemal alsalht lahum 'ajr eazim ghyr maqtue wala mnqws

ay shay' yhmlk -ayha al'insan- ealaa 'an tkdhdhib balbeth waljza' mae wuduh al'adilat ealaa qudrat allah taealaa ealaa dhlk?
alys allah aladhi jaeal hdha alyawm llfsl bayn alnaas bi'ahkam alhakimin fi kl ma khlq? bla. fahal yutrk alkhalq sudana la yumarun wala yunhwn, wala ythabwn wala yeaqbwn? la yshh dhlk wala ykwn

aqra -ayha alnby- ma 'unzl 'iilayk min alquran muftatihana biasm rabik almtfrd balkhlq, aladhi khalaq kl 'iinsan min qiteat dam ghaliz ahmr. aqra -ayha alnby- ma 'unzl 'ilyk, wa'iina rabak likathir al'iihsan wasie aljwd, aladhi ellam khalaqah alkitabat balqlm, ellam al'iinsan ma lam yakun yelm, wanaqlih min zulmat aljahl 'iilaa nur alelm

aqra -ayha alnby- ma 'unzl 'iilayk min alquran muftatihana biasm rabik almtfrd balkhlq, aladhi khalaq kl 'iinsan min qiteat dam ghaliz ahmr. aqra -ayha alnby- ma 'unzl 'ilyk, wa'iina rabak likathir al'iihsan wasie aljwd, aladhi ellam khalaqah alkitabat balqlm, ellam al'iinsan ma lam yakun yelm, wanaqlih min zulmat aljahl 'iilaa nur alelm

aqra -ayha alnby- ma 'unzl 'iilayk min alquran muftatihana biasm rabik almtfrd balkhlq, aladhi khalaq kl 'iinsan min qiteat dam ghaliz ahmr. aqra -ayha alnby- ma 'unzl 'ilyk, wa'iina rabak likathir al'iihsan wasie aljwd, aladhi ellam khalaqah alkitabat balqlm, ellam al'iinsan ma lam yakun yelm, wanaqlih min zulmat aljahl 'iilaa nur alelm

aqra -'ayaha alnabi- ma 'unzl 'iilayk min alquran muftatihana biasm rabik almutafarid bialkhalqi, aladhi khalaq kla 'iinsan min qiteat dama ghaliz 'ahmara. aqra -'ayaha alnabi- ma 'unzl 'iilayka, wa'iina rabak likathir al'iihsan wasie aljawdi, aladhi ellam khalaqah alkitabat bialqulma, ellam al'iinsan ma lam yakun yaelimu, wanaqlih min zulmat aljahl 'iilaa nur aleilmi

aqira -'ayaha alnabi- ma 'unzl 'iilayk min alquran muftatihana biasm rabik almutafarid bialkhalqi, aladhi khalaq kla 'iinsan min qiteat dama ghaliz 'ahmara. aqra -'ayaha alnabi- ma 'unzl 'iilayka, wa'iina rabak likathir al'iihsan wasie aljawdi, aladhi ellam khalaqah alkitabat bialqulma, ellam al'iinsan ma lam yakun yaelimu, wanaqlih min zulmat aljahl 'iilaa nur alelm
hqana 'iina al'iinsan liatajawaz hudud allah 'iidha 'ubtirah alghanaa, falyaelim kla taghiat 'ana almasir 'iilaa allah, fayajazi kll 'iinsan bemlh
hqana 'iina al'iinsan liatajawaz hudud allah 'iidha 'ubtirah alghanaa, filyaelam kl taghiat 'ana almasir 'iilaa allih, fiajazi kll 'iinsan bemlh
hqana 'iina al'iinsan liatajawaz hudud allah 'iidha 'abtirah alghanaa, filyuelam kl taghiat 'ana almasir 'iilaa alliha, fiajazi kll 'iinsan bieamalh

'ara'ayt 'aejab min tghyan hdha alrajul (whw 'abu jhl) aldhy ynha ebdana lana 'iidha slla lirabih (whw muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm)? 'ara'ayt 'iin kan almnhy ean alsalat ealaa alhudaa fkyf ynhah? 'aw 'iin kan amrana ghyrh baltqwa aynhah ean dhlk? 'ara'ayt 'iin kdhdhab hdha alnahy bima yudea 'ilyh, wa'aerid enh, 'alam yaelam bi'ana allah yaraa kl ma yfel? lays al'amr kama yazeum 'abu jhl, layin lam yarjie hdha ean shqaqh wadhah lnakhdhnn bmqddam rasih akhdhana enyfana, wyutrh fi alnar, nasyth nasiat kadhibat fi mqalha, khatiat fi afealha. flyuhdir hdha alttaghiat 'ahl nadih aladhin ystnsr bhm, sndew malayikat aledhab. lays al'amr ealaa ma yazunu 'abu jhl, 'iinah ln ynalk -ayha alrswl- bsw', fala tutieh fima deak 'iilayh min tark alslat, wasjud lirabik waqtarib minh balthbb 'iilayh btaeth

'ina 'anzalna alquran fi laylat alsharaf walfdl, wahi 'ihda layali shahr rmdan
wma 'adrak -ayha alnby- ma laylat alqadr walshrf?
lylt alqadr laylat mbarkt, fadluha khayr min fadl 'alf shahr lays fiha laylat qdr
ykthr nuzul almalayikat wajibril ealayh alslam fyha, bi'iidhn rabihim min kuli 'amr qdah fi tilk alsnt
hy 'amn klha, la shrr fiha 'iilaa matlae alfjr
lm yakun aladhin kafaruu min alyhwd walnsara walmushrikin tarkyn kufruhum hataa tatiahum aleallamat alty wueidu biha fi alkutub alsabqt
why rasul allah muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, yatlu qranana fi suhuf mthrt
fy tilk alsuhuf 'akhbar sadqt wa'awamir eadlt, tahdi 'iilaa alhaqi wa'iilaa sirat mstqym

wma akhtalaf aladhin 'uwtuu alkitab min alyhwd walnsara fi kawn muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam rasulana hqana; lamaa yajidunah min neth fi ktabhm, 'iilaa min baed ma tbynu 'anah alnabii aldhy wueidu bih fi altawrat wal'injyl, fakanuu mjtmeyn ealaa sihat nbwth, falamaa bueith jhdwha wtfrraqu
wama 'umiruu fi sayr alshraye 'iilaa liaebuduu allah wahdah qasdyn bieibadatihim wjhh, maylyn ean alshirk 'iilaa al'iyman, wayuqimuu alslat, wyuaddu alzkat, wdhlk hu din alastqamt, wahu al'islam
'in aladhin kafaruu min alyhwd walnsara walmushrikin eqabhm nar jahanam khalidin fyha, 'uwlayik hum 'ashadu alkhlyqt shra
'in aladhin saddaqu allah watabaeuu rasulih waeamiluu alsalhat, 'uwlayik hum khayr alkhlq

jzawhm eind rabihim yawm alqiamat janaat 'iiqamat waistiqrar fi mntha alhsn, tajri min taht qswrha alanhar, khalidin fiha abdana, radi allah eanhum fqbl 'aemalahum alsalht, waraduu eanh bima aedd lahum min 'anwae alkramat, dhlk aljaza' alhasan liman khaf allah wajtnb measyh
'idha rujjat al'ard rjjana shdydana, wa'akhrajat ma fi btnha min mwta wknwz, watasa'al al'iinsan fzeana: ma aldhy hadath lha?

ywm alqiamat tukhbir al'ard bima euml ealayha min khayr 'aw shr, wabi'an allah subhanah wteala 'amriha bi'ana tukhbir bima euml elyha
